column5: I'll win this battle, and free everyone!!
Though I'm in spirit form right now,
it seems there won't be any problem
moving my body as I have up until now.
I've got to search for Cygna and Kureha immediately...
were done in by this thing!
...It seems you will not step aside...
I will eliminate you as soon as possible!!#0E
Those two lost to this opponent...
And what's more, I don't have Noi
...However, there's no way I can lose!!
